title: Problems building MVAPICH2 and Parallel NetCDF with Intel
body:
I'm now seeing intermittent problems building MVAPICH2 with Intel. I'll try:

```
spack install mvapich2 %intel +mrail
```

and it will crash during `make`. Then I'll run:

```
spack install hdf5@1.10.0 %intel +szip -cxx +mpi ^mvapich2+mrail
```

and MVAPICH2 will install without any trouble.

In addition, I'm unable to build parallel-netcdf with Intel and OpenMPI. Here are the `spack-build.out` and `config.log` files:

```
spack install parallel-netcdf %intel ^openmpi+tm+verbs
```

[spack-build.out](https://github.com/LLNL/spack/files/284643/spack-build.txt)
[config.log](https://github.com/LLNL/spack/files/284644/config.txt)

```
spack install parallel-netcdf %intel ^openmpi+tm+psm
```

[spack-build.out](https://github.com/LLNL/spack/files/284645/spack-build.txt)
[config.log](https://github.com/LLNL/spack/files/284646/config.txt)

@lee218llnl Any idea what's going on here? I removed all extraneous MPI installations from my paths and am using only the single `-Xlinker` line in my icc.cfg/icpc.cfg/ifort.cfg.
